name: Play with Balloon (itch)
description:
A game in development for fun. Since there's tons of balloon prints, some might be licensed to other artists. If you are said artist who would like me to take down a balloon print, please contact me immediately on Discord at Babipoki#0001. The said print will be removed within next 20 minutes of me reading the message and new silent patch will be released afterwards. This game is not made for commercial purposes.

Warning: A lot of the game has placeholder assets.

The game is made as sort of a 'tech demo' for the upcoming Little Balloon Shop. You can follow updates for both games on it the game's private discord. For invite, add Babipoki#0001 on Discord.

Features:

  • Selling balloons to customers with needs, such as balloon color, shape or print.
  • A bunch of prints(over 60).
  • Over 7 different customers who visit your shop frequently.
  • Blowing up the balloons and popping them.
  • Physics!
  • Earning money, and spending them to buy more balloons!
  • Simple and bunny shaped balloons.

Upcoming features:

  • More customers;
  • Modding;
  • More prints;
  • More balloon shapes;
  • More stuff to spend money on;
  • Virtual stock market;
  • MORE!
